p: All patients will be followed according to the protocol (i.e., once every 3 months). Physical examination, tumor marker examination, and chest X-ray examination will be performed every 3 months. Computed tomography (CT) or magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans will be performed every 3 months for the first 2 years and every 6 months for the 3rd year. Endoscopy will be performed once a year.
